no sound ever plays with aplay ?: if i were you i'd take to see if i need special module parameters (like model= ) .. these go into the module options file, or can be tested on the fly with the modprobe command..
the option parameters are passed to the snd-hda-intel module
I created an .asoundrc file. I guess I'll need to relog to try if it works
may be related, you probably need something much simpler than what this post has..  http://ubuntuforums.org/archive/index.php/t-1191894.html

I had to make sure I put the right option for my computer (an HP Pavillion HDX 16 laptop) into /etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base.conf:
2012-05-27T04:01:00.000Z	jagginess		options snd-hda-intel model=hp-hdx
2012-05-27T04:01:00.000Z	jagginess
